name: Platformer (First Godot Project)
description:
Use WASD or Arrow Keys to Move

Watch out for enemies, but you can stomp on their heads

Made in a few days to learn the Godot Engine.

Mostly followed BornCG's tutorial series, but added alot on my own.

Music: Eric Skiff - A Night Of Dizzy Spells - Resistor Anthems - Available at http://EricSkiff.com/music

Music: Eric Skiff - Chibi Ninja - Resistor Anthems - Available at http://EricSkiff.com/music
